text: Nya parken is a sports ground in the town of Norrköping int Sweden. It was opened in 1903 as Norrköpings idrottspark. IFK Norrköping, IK Sleipner and IF Sylvia play their soccer home games there. Games were also played there during the 1958 FIFA World Cup and the 1992 UEFA European Championship ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1903 establishments in Sweden Category:Stadiums in Sweden Category:Football stadiums in Sweden Category:Norrköping
title: Nya Parken
